name: Super Volcanic Pore Clay Mask 2X
how_to_use: Apply evenly to cleansed skin. Leave on for 10–15 minutes. Rinse off with lukewarm water.

name: Calendula Petal-Infused Calming Mask
how_to_use: Apply a visible layer to clean skin. Leave on for 15 minutes, then rinse.

name: Avocado Nourishing Hydration Mask
how_to_use: Apply generously to skin, leave on for 15 minutes, and rinse with water.

name: Luminizing Black Charcoal Mask
how_to_use: Apply a thick, opaque layer. Let dry and peel off from edges.

name: Get Your Glow On Skin-Brightening Peel Mask
how_to_use: Apply to freshly cleansed skin. Wait 10–15 minutes, peel off gently.
